name: Universitatea Politehnica din Bucuresti
membership: UPB is member of CESAEER, EUA, AUF, VKI
goal:
A few of UPB's objectives are:
- to become a top university in the South-East Europe in scientifically research and also a pole of competency, knowledge and competitivity;
- to award an international recognition in research area;
- to generate novel ideas and provide basic and applied research.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Research Fund for Coal and Steel - Coal Advisory Group
